title: Yes, Your Grace
notes: Keyboard & mouse controls. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
description: In this kingdom management RPG, petitioners will arrive in the throne room each turn to ask for your advice and assistance. Decide whether to help them with their problems, or to conserve resources for more important matters. Remember: supplies are limited, and not everyone has the kingdomâ€™s best interests at heart...
